title: 23 How to Get Unstuck and Turn Average into Awesome with Jon Acuff
description: Facing your fears can be one the hardest thing to do. It's that fear that holds us back from taking massive action to go after our dreams. For many, it's easier to sit on the couch and do what the world tells you to do. However, this podcast is for those seeking to make a dent, […]
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
